participant_1.background:
I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

participant_2.background:
I don't go to Comic Con, but I like to run and drink chai tea.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

content.text: I like to play soccer, go to the park, and experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks.
Sounds fun! I enjoy running and drinking chai tea.
I love chai tea! What's your favorite thing about running?
I love the feeling of being outside and getting exercise. It's also a great way to clear my head.
I agree! I love running in the park, especially when the weather is nice.
Me too! I also love running on the beach.
I've never been to Bali, but it looks beautiful! I've always wanted to go to an exotic place.
It's definitely worth a visit! The beaches are amazing and the food is delicious.
I'll have to put it on my list of places to visit!
You should! I'm sure you'd love it.
